glsa.title: libxslt: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libxslt could result in Denial of Service.

background.p: libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT is an XML language to define transformations for XML.

description.p: An out of bounds read error has been found in libxslt/pattern.c in libxslt.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to process an XML file using a specially crafted XSLT stylesheet in an application linked against libxslt, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libxslt users should upgrade to the latest version:
